item.title: WRD Stock Rallies 7% On Robotaxi Fleet Expansion In Middle East With Uber - What Does Retail Think?
item.description: WeRide said that the autonomous vehicles would be deployed across Abu Dhabi, Dubai, and Riyadh and customers can avail them via the Uber app.

item.title: Dow Rallies Over 50,000 For The First Time, S&P 500 Edges Higher Amid Tech Revival
item.description: The Dow Jones Industrial Average climbed over 2.3% to a 50,000 record, while the S&P 50 increased 1.72%.

item.title: SMX Shares Rallied Over 129% Today — Here’s Why
item.description: SMX (Security Matters) said on Friday that it has extended its capital runway into 2028.

item.title: Why Did FGL Stock Slump To A Record Low Today?
item.description: Founder Group shares fell 40% on Friday after the company announced a reverse share split in a 1-for-100 ratio

item.title: PYPL Stock Has Shed 30% Over Past 10 Sessions – So Why Is Retail Still Bullish?
item.description: PayPal’s shares have declined for 10 consecutive sessions, falling to a level last seen around 9 years ago.
